ComicInfo.Summary:
Story 1
Void prepares to enter the mind of Voodoo, who has been in a comatose state for some time. Meanwhile, Grifter is battling Daemonites so he can find out who was the one behind ordering a shape-shifting Daemonite to infiltrate the WildC.A.T.s. He learns from his interrogation that the one behind it is Hightower, a Daemonite the WildC.A.T.s have crossed paths with in the past. While Grifter continues his search, Void goes through Voodoo's psyche, helping her battle whatever is causing her to remain comatose, and succeeding. Grifter calls his teammates, telling them that he has learned that Hightower is going to meet some Coda assassins in Washington, DC.
Story 2: Wedding Day Jitters
A back-up story involving a past adventure of Savant.
ComicInfo.Title: Hard Hunt; Wedding Day Jitters
